name: Dragon Acres: Demo (KendallFire, Thrilmur, Jimakiad, Angel Star Studios)
name_original: Dragon Acres: Demo (KendallFire, Thrilmur, Jimakiad, Angel Star Studios)
description:
If you had the chance to leave everything behind... Everything you know... To explore a new world... And start a new life... Would you do it? And could you do it?

Welcome to YOUR OWN Dragon Acres! Dragon Acres is a casual farming RPG with a unique twist! The Dragon's you raise are a sign of good luck in the Dragon Isles. They are helpful little companions who have a mysterious connection to nature.

These adorable dragons have a unique effect on the crops on the lands of their Dragon Masters, making them a powerful asset to have on your farm.

Meet fun and quirky characters with unique personalities and interesting dialogue! These are just some of the characters you'll meet!

 

Crawford: The burly mountain area researcher!

  

 Zaine: The laid back beach area researcher!

 

Hilda: The mystic like forest area researcher!

Explore a captivating new world with a story you can complete in your own time. The Acres are yours to explore!

NOTE: Dragon Acres was created in a couple months for the Pixel Game Maker MV for the PGMMV Development Challenge. It features NEARLY ALL original artwork by various talented artists and and a soundtrack composed by Alessio Ruscelli.   

 THINGS WE DEFINITELY PLAN TO IMPLEMENT LATER ON: 

- Seasons

- More dragons

- Items

- Combat

- Mining

- A more non-linear (Player Choices Driven)  story approach

- And Much More!
